query: Q1. In the following URL, what channel grouping is traffic assigned to?
options:
Display
 Google
 Organic Search
 Paid Search

query: Q2. If you want to evaluate if direct traffic delivered more traffic than organic search in August 2019, which report do you look at?
options:
Audience > Behavior > Engagement
 Realtime > Traffic Sources
 Acquisition > All Traffic > Channels
 Acquisition > All Traffic > Referrals

query: Q3. What is the relationship between an event and an event goal?
options:
Nothing, an event is another name for event goal.
 An event is captured per user; an event goal is captured per session.
 An event goal must be created in order to track events.
 An event is a user interaction; an event goal is triggered by a selected event.

query: Q4. A user downloads a white paper with event tracking once in a single session. Another user downloads the same white paper three times in a single session. How many unique events are counted?
options:
one
 three
 two
 four

query: Q5. What are the icons highlighted below used for?
options:
to change the way the data table is displayed
 to adjust the date range
 to assign secondary dimensions
 to compare data to previous periods

query: Q6. Which report would help you measure the value of your social media efforts?
options:
Campaigns > Cost Analysis
 Social > Conversions
 Goals > Reverse Goal Path
 Goals > Smart Goals

query: Q7. What is an example of a metric?
options:
City

 Browser
 Pageviews

 custom dimensions

 a high bounce rate

query: Q16. What is the hierarchy of a Google Analytics account?

all the views of that property

query: Q20. Of the following segments, which represents the highest value audience?

query: Q22. You offer a downloadable music file called Sample Tone on your website. What is the best way to configure the components to track this event?
